alert.note: Alert for Ashley (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 8:50AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Ashley County, eastern Morehouse, northeastern Richland and West Carroll Parishes through 915 AM CDT... At 850 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Galion to near Holly Ridge. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Jones and Galion around 855 AM CDT. Wilmot around 905 AM CDT. Parkdale and Darnell around 910 AM CDT. Portland and Goodwill around 915 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Forest, Bonita, Mer Rouge, Pioneer, Oak Ridge and Epps. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees.
